workflow_rationale: Feature implementation that completes partial profile editing functionality. Adds skills/interests tags, social links editing, and company selection UI while enhancing existing profile fields with proper validation.

phases.name: Database Schema Migration
phases.description: Add skills field to bot_profiles table in Supabase

subtasks.description: Add skills TEXT[] field to bot_profiles table

verification.instructions: Run SQL in Supabase: ALTER TABLE bot_profiles ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS skills TEXT[]; Verify column exists in table schema

subtasks.notes: Created migrations/add_skills_to_bot_profiles.sql with ALTER TABLE bot_profiles ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS skills TEXT[]. User must run SQL in Supabase SQL Editor to apply.

phases.name: Foundation - Types & API Functions
phases.description: Update TypeScript types and Supabase API functions for new profile fields

subtasks.description: Update UserProfile type with skills field
subtasks.notes: Added skills: string[] | null field to UserProfile interface in src/types/index.ts. Follows the same pattern as the existing interests field. Committed as 956a83a.

subtasks.description: Update updateProfile and createProfile functions to handle skills/interests
subtasks.notes: Updated updateProfile and createProfile function signatures to accept skills and interests arrays (string[] | null). The implementation uses spread operator so these fields are automatically included in database operations. Committed as 97e3576.

phases.name: UI Components
phases.description: Create reusable components for tags, social links editing, and company selection

subtasks.description: Create TagInput component for skills and interests

verification.instructions: Import TagInput in ProfileScreen, render with test data, verify tags display and add/remove works

subtasks.notes: Created TagInput component at src/components/TagInput.tsx with: animated tag badges using framer-motion, add/remove functionality, keyboard support (Enter to add, Backspace to remove), validation (max 10 tags, 30 chars per tag, duplicate prevention), input sanitization for XSS prevention. Follows existing Tailwind patterns. Committed as 4217c63.

subtasks.description: Create SocialLinksEdit component for editing links

verification.instructions: Render component with test user ID, verify add/edit/remove link functionality with validation

subtasks.notes: Created SocialLinksEdit component at src/components/SocialLinksEdit.tsx with: add/edit/remove functionality for social links, URL validation patterns for all link types (LinkedIn, GitHub, GitLab, Behance, Dribbble, Instagram, Telegram, portfolio, website), platform-specific error messages, Framer Motion animations, integration with setUserLink/removeUserLink Supabase functions, haptic feedback on interactions, loading states during save/delete, and input sanitization for XSS prevention. Committed as 4b30a93.

subtasks.description: Create CompanySelector component for company affiliation

verification.instructions: Render component with test user ID, verify company selection and role editing works

subtasks.notes: Created CompanySelector component at miniapp/src/components/CompanySelector.tsx with: company search and selection from database, role/position input (max 100 chars), edit/remove functionality, Framer Motion animations, loading states for async operations, input sanitization for XSS prevention, haptic feedback on interactions, responsive design following existing patterns, integration with setUserCompany/removeUserCompany Supabase functions. Committed as bf09cda.

phases.name: ProfileScreen Integration
phases.description: Integrate new components into ProfileScreen edit form and wire up state/API

subtasks.description: Add skills and interests TagInput fields to edit form

verification.instructions: Enter edit mode, verify skills and interests tag inputs render and update editForm state

subtasks.notes: Added TagInput import, extended editForm state with skills and interests arrays, added TagInput components for both fields in edit form with max 10 tags and 30 chars per tag, updated edit button reset to include skills/interests. Committed as 46bba5f.

subtasks.description: Add SocialLinksEdit component to edit form

verification.instructions: Enter edit mode, verify social links editor renders, can add/edit/remove links with validation

subtasks.notes: Add SocialLinksEdit after tag inputs in edit mode. Pass user.id and onSave callback. Social links save independently via setUserLink, not through main profile save.

subtasks.description: Add CompanySelector component to edit form

verification.instructions: Enter edit mode, verify company selector renders, can select company and add role

subtasks.notes: Add CompanySelector in edit form after occupation field. Pass user.id and update callback. Company saves independently via setUserCompany.

subtasks.description: Display skills and interests in profile view mode

checks: Tags only show when data exists

subtasks.notes: Add Card components for skills and interests in view mode (after line 816) following pattern from bio/looking_for cards. Render tags as Badge components.

phases.name: Validation & Error Handling
phases.description: Add comprehensive validation, error messages, and edge case handling

subtasks.description: Add validation for all profile fields with character limits

verification.instructions: Test: bio > 500 chars shows error, tags > 30 chars rejected, max 10 tags enforced, invalid social URLs rejected

subtasks.notes: Add character counters for bio (500), occupation (100). Validate in handleSaveProfile before API call. Show errors via addToast with error type.

subtasks.description: Add loading states and error handling for all save operations

verification.instructions: Verify: Save button shows loader, toast appears on success/error, form doesn't close on error

subtasks.notes: Existing isSaving state (line 153) handles profile save. Add loading states to social links and company save operations. Show hapticFeedback on success/error.

phases.name: End-to-End Verification
phases.description: Comprehensive testing of complete profile editing flow

subtasks.description: End-to-end test of complete profile editing

steps: Add 3 skills tags, add 3 interests tags
Verify all fields display in view mode

subtasks.notes: Full flow testing. Verify React Query cache invalidation, Zustand state updates, Supabase persistence, no console errors.

parallelism.speedup_estimate: Sequential execution required due to phase dependencies

acceptance_criteria: Profile editing UI is complete and functional
No console errors during profile operations
Form validation prevents invalid data submission

verification_steps.expected_outcome: Build succeeds with no TypeScript errors

verification_steps.name: Development Server
verification_steps.expected_outcome: Server starts without errors on port 3000

verification_steps.expected_outcome: Profile editing works end-to-end, all fields save and display

verification_strategy.reasoning: Medium risk change requiring careful validation. Modifies existing profile editing code. Adds new database field (skills) and new UI components. Risk of breaking existing profile functionality.

integration_tests.notes: No integration tests exist. Manual E2E testing required.

checks: All form fields render in edit mode
Social links editor works (add/edit/remove with validation)
View mode displays all saved data
